So yesterday i had another little "party" thing. Bill, Krista, Cristina, Hogan, Nathan, Steven, Angie, Nikki and Dillon came. It was one of my better ones. We didnt swim much tho. It was mostly indoors, other then cigarettes and trampoline. Bill brought his DDR so we played that. Me and Krista played pool against Hogan and Dillon. That was quite interesting, especially neigher one of them can play pool. We played 3 games, they won 2 of them just because we scratched on the 8 ball. So later, Bill and Cristina made out in the spare bedroom while the rest of us were chilling on the trampoline. They came out and them me and angie went in there. Haha, then Nikki and Hogan decided to join us. So then of course my mom walks in. She just kinda said something to me then shut the lights back off then closed the door. Wow i love my mom. That was wicked fun. Earlier in the pool, it was only me, nikki, angie, krista, dillon and hogan. To we all decided to gang up on nikki and pull her top off hen hide it from her. THAT was fun. :D then me and angie decided to take ours off too. haha were losers. I cooked on the grill later and they were all calling me butch. *pouts* But whatever.
Anywho, i had fun. Defiantely doing it again, soon. <3

yeah i havent posted in like forever. so yeah thursday, me and meghan had this wonderful idea of going to see a movie. and we needed to have another sleepover cuz its been forever since we had one. ok so we went and saw the ringer. good movie. then chilled at the loop for a bit. then i slept over meghan's house. yeah we rented lords of dogtown from ON DEMAND. another good movie. then we decided to brake out the rum. so we each had one. then we were looking through the liquer cabinet and found rasberry vodka. we couldnt find anything to mix it with so we had a whole friggin glass straight. yeah i was sooooo wasted. meghan was telling me all the weird things i did....

so i thought meghan was a snake and i was licking her arm, i claimed i was colin, i had sex with a light, i thought the bathroom was a monkey closet, i pet the chair thinking it was a snake, i told meghan i had to go to the bathroom then sat down and took out my knife, we stuffed a blanket in side a sleeping bag, then i got inside it all, yeah theres more but i forget... you'll have to ask meghan about those.

oh yeah and i puked....eew

now my cousin is over for the weekend. we watched the nightmare before christmas =)!!!! the best movie in the world. and we made some carmel popcorn...but its nasty cuz its like burnt. yuckey!

yeah and i have the biggest hangover i ever had in my life and i still feel like im gonna puke. yeah so basically i feel like shit. yeah bye for now... next post will probably be next year!!!! hehe

<3 oh yeah and now i have a lovely girlfriend named cristina! =)
